ee.adit.ws.endpoint
Class XteeCustomEndpoint

java.lang.Object
  ee.adit.ws.endpoint.XteeCustomEndpoint
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.ws.server.endpoint.MessageEndpoint
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractAditBaseEndpoint
public abstract class XteeCustomEndpoint
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.ws.server.endpoint.MessageEndpoint

Base class for web-service endpoints. Wraps the X-Tee specific operations and data manipulation. Web-service endpoints extending this class will not have to be aware of the X-Tee specific SOAP envelope. The class is a modified version of the XRoad java library class ee.webmedia.xtee.endpoint.AbstractXTeeBaseEndpoint.

Author:
Marko Kurm, Microlink Eesti AS, marko.kurm@microlink.ee, Jaak Lember, Interinx, jaak@interinx.com

ignoreAttachmentHeaders

private boolean ignoreAttachmentHeaders
If true then SOAP attachment headers will not be corrected before sending query response. This is useful when returning original attachments within an error message.

invoke

public final void invoke(org.springframework.ws.context.MessageContext messageContext)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
The entry point for web-service call. Extracts the X-Tee operation node and passes it to the getResponse(CustomXTeeHeader, Document, SOAPMessage, SOAPMessage, Document) method for futher processing.

Specified by:
invoke in interface org.springframework.ws.server.endpoint.MessageEndpoint
Parameters:
messageContext - the message context
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an exception occurs while processing the request.

findBodyNode

private org.w3c.dom.Node findBodyNode(javax.xml.soap.SOAPBody soapBody)
Finds "keha" element from X-Tee message in namespace-unaware fashion.
This is useful if service consumer has placed "keha" element in some namespace. In such case namespace-aware solutions are likely to fail.

Parameters:
soapBody - Body part of request SOAP envelope as SOAPBody
Returns:
Node representing "keha" element (or null if "keha" was not found).

getResponse

private void getResponse(CustomXTeeHeader header,
                         org.w3c.dom.Document query,
                         javax.xml.soap.SOAPMessage responseMessage,
                         javax.xml.soap.SOAPMessage requestMessage,
                         org.w3c.dom.Document operationNode)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
Copies the request query and headers to the response message, invokes the underlying web-service endpoint in AbstractAditBaseEndpoint. If the query is a metaservice (listMethods) query, then the query and headers are not copied.

Parameters:
header - X-Tee header
query - query document
responseMessage - response message
requestMessage - request message
operationNode - X-Tee specific operation node
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

createXteeMessageStructure

                                                       throws java.lang.Exception
Creates X-Tee specific structure for SOAP message: adds MIME headers, base namespaces.

Parameters:
requestMessage - request SOAP message
responseMessage - response SOAP message
Returns:
the service element of the SOAP response message

isIgnoreAttachmentHeaders

public boolean isIgnoreAttachmentHeaders()
Indicates whether SOAP attachments headers are to be corrected.

true if this request should not attempt to correct response attachment headers.
